economic_room.description: Unlocks three other upgrades in the castle.

faster_coin_generation.description: Decreases the time it takes to automatically generate coins by 67%.

better_sell_deals.description: Increases the melon sell price by 0.15.

hearth.description: Adds a room to the castle that gives regeneration when stood inside.

private_merchant.description: Adds a merchant to the castle.

personal_greenhouse.description: Spawns a small farm inside the castle.

stronger_front_door.description: Makes the door take 3 hits to fully break instead of 1.

castle_ladder.description: Adds a ladder onto the roof inside the castle.

castle_roof.description: Adds a roof to all rooms of the castle.

better_jailors.description: Jail time increased by 5 seconds, and jail cooldown decreased by 5 seconds.

lock_and_key.description: Guards can now toggle auto-jailing players they hit if possible.

item_removal_procedures.description: More items are removed by jailing players.

castle_backyard.description: Opens the side of the castle, but blocks off an area connected to that new door.

castle_basement.description: Adds a basement to the backyard. Also lets you see player counts while inside of it.

urban_start.description: Adds 3 new buildings to the city, along with 1 new area to get upgrades in.

religion_start.display: To The Victor Goes The Spoils
religion_start.description: Opens an area behind the farm with 8 new upgrades. Awakens the melon god.
